Package edu.psu.citeseerx.corecom

Interface Summary
ConnectionPoolMonitor Interface for listening to events in a connection pool.
ServiceCommand This interface should be used to specify how objects read from an ObjectServer's ObjectTransferConnection should be handled.
 

Class Summary
ByteStreamConnectionPool Manages a pool of ByteStreamTransferConnections.
ByteStreamObjectServer ObjectServer implementation that wraps incoming connections as ByteStreamTransferConnections.
ByteStreamSocketInitializer Socket initialization implementation for wrapping sockets as ByteStreamTransferConnections.
ByteStreamTransferConnection Used to create a communication channel around a base socket for transferring objects by byte stream serialization.
CompressedBlockInputStream  
CompressedBlockOutputStream  
ConnectionPool ConnectionPool manages client connections to a remote server host, where connections are of type ObjectTransferConnection.
ConnectionPoolConfiguration Container class for a ConnectionPool configuration.
InitializationProtocol Protocol used to check the initialization status of new connections.
InvalidRequest ServiceCommand objects use this class to inform callers when the ServiceCommand is called to operate on an expected object type.
ObjectServer This class maintains a multi-threaded server architecture for efficiently handling ObjectTransferConnections.
ObjectTransferConnection Generic functionality for object transfer connections.
ServerConfiguration Container class for holding ObjectServer configuration and performing configuration I/O using a ConfigurationManager.
SocketInitializer A container for socket connections that allows an implementation-specific initialization routine whose call can be delayed until an appropriate time.
ValidationMessage Container for validation messages, used by ObjectTransferConnections to make sure that the connection is working properly.
XStreamConnectionPool Manages a pool of XStreamTransferConnections.
XStreamObjectServer ObjectServer implementation that wraps incoming connections as XStreamTransferConnections.
XStreamSocketInitializer Socket initialization implementation for wrapping sockets as XStreamTransferConnections.
XStreamTransferConnection Used to create a communication channel around a base socket for transferring objects by XML serialization using XStream.
 

Enum Summary
ServerConfiguration.TYPE
